title: Clair de Femme = Woman Light
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel 'Clair de Femme' by Romain Gary.
description: Michel is running away from home and his dying wife. While wandering aimlesslely, he meets Lydia who is still grieving the loss of her husband and child. For a whole night these two desperate characters are walking the streets of Paris, visiting bars and cabarets, and meeting equally strange, emotionally displaced people.  Credits: Producer, Georges-Alain Vuille ; director, Costa-Gavras ; writer, Costa-Gavras ; photography, Ricardo Aronovich ; music, Jean Musy. Cast: Yves Montand, Romy Schneider, Romolo Valli, Lila Kedrova, Heinz Bennent, Roberto Benigni, Francois Perrot, Daniel Mesguich, Catherine Allegret, Dieter Schidor.
